EternityPatchFile.name: NewStage
EternityPatchFile.comment: This file enables the new stages patch

Instruction.comment: call is_stage_3B; stage 3b is the 'BFwis' stage

Patch.name: PatchStageDef1Off8_3+4
Patch.comment: Takes place in stagex_func1 AND stagex_func2

Instruction.comment: xchg ax, ax, aka double nop
lea r13d, [rsi-2]; Num of ss stages

Patch.name: PatchStageNum1+2
Patch.comment: Takes place in stagex_func1 AND stagex_func2

Patch.name: PatchStageNum8
Patch.comment: This function takes place in btlsound_func1
